thread.section_title: TrekEarth - South America Travel Photo Gallery
thread.title: Aerial Cable Cars

title: Aerial Cable Cars
text:
(89408) 2015-08-13 4:48 
Hello Alexandre, The colourful gondolas sit well against the saturated blue sky. I also like the inclusion of the trees, which add another element in terms of tone and texture. Very good technical quality. (143820) 2015-08-13 4:51 
Hello Alexandre, The Parques da Serra Aerial Cable Cars give the visitors the opportunity to behold the traditional Caracol Falls, and take of nice pictures. The yellow - red - yellow cabines makes your picture colorful. An excellent depth and perspective. Sharpness and clarity are pleasant. Very well composition, lovely presentation. Excellent done, TFS.
